A young lad and adventurer, who saves Alk from a haunted manor. He's undead, which leads the Guild to entrust him with somewhat singular missions. The casket he carries serves, occasionally, as his bivouac.

A mage who, within the Kaleidoscope, uncovered the Demon's Abyss. He has since delved deep into the lore of black magic. He is a scholar at heart, trusting only in reason, and until now, has shunned the company of other humans.

Son of the Nouin clan, one of the Farland's Nine Noble Houses. This young aristocrat, locked in a friendly rivalry with Alk, stirs up havoc when he suddenly challenges the gourmand adventurer to the deadliest of contests: cooking.
A Gaean Defense Captain posted at the end of the sea. A seasoned warrior with a kind heart, he commands the respect of his young crew. Lost his right eye in battle long ago.
A necromancer from a far-off realm who's able to command the undead. With her deceased parents always by her side, she's developed a rather twisted view of the world.
A stunning, rifle-wielding lady absolutely obsessed with beauty. Donning a climate-appropriate outfit, she heads out with friends to have a BEAUTIFUL summer vacation.
2:
Without wavering for a single moment, she was able to perceive all the beauty that awaited on Paradise Isle.

Indeed, she was STUNNING even when losing everything in the casino, Illumine's creative use of illusions was positively GORGEOUS, and Liesel's commitment to returning everyone home safely was simply SPLENDID!

1: An adventurer from a backwater town near Palpebra who grew up not communicating with many people his own age. Upbeat and kind in nature, this burly, axe-wielding warrior is somewhat self-conscious of how clumsy he is.

A wandering alchemist who roams cities in the Endless Blue. He used to belong to a scholarly organization known as the Tartas Society for Alchemic Studies, but despite his exile, commits himself wholeheartedly to proving his hypothesis correct.
A young girl who scours the Kaleidoscope for the belongings of the deceased. For Halloween, she's donned an extra-special outfit—though she's not entirely happy about it.
2: Though it was her job to do so, she was treated poorly for informing families of the death of loved ones. After the jack-o'-lantern trouble was over, the children who had been unpleasant apologized and made up with her.

1: A master herbalist traversing through the deserts. Her antics against the kingdom have marked her as a wanted criminal.
Former member of the Lord of Shadow's army. In the past, she could be quite guarded, but since coming to Starview and reuniting with her sister Arum, she's begun to loosen up.
2:
Despite her lack of any particular strength, she struggled with all her being to protect what mattered most to her.

Having finally obtained some respite, she now strives to find her own path, alongside steadfast friends.

1: A special operative working for the Gaean government. In the depths of the ocean, he encountered a mysterious presence that bestowed him with mysterious powers—which he uses to great benefit in his work.
A set of sentient armor, worn on a half-dead man. He moves the lifeless body with magic, though he hasn't managed anything better than zombie-like movements so far.

A young man who leads a trade caravan in the Kingdom of Sand. Despite his youth, he is gifted with entrepreneurial genius, which he uses to ensure great profits for his caravan. It seems that long ago, he visited Rolan's palace to do trade.

A mystery-loving detective with a dubious moral compass and a sharp sense for danger. 

She claims to have moved on from her dastardly ways, but whether that's true or not remains to be seen.

Born into a family of arms dealers, Quazer is accustomed to getting everything she desires no matter the cost. From children and handicrafts, to stuffed animals and candy, she loves adorable things above all else. But woe is the fool who gets between her and the objects of her desire.
The CEO of DayAndNight, a company tied to the larger Noxel Group. Love herself is an enhanced being created by Noxel's "Myriad Project."

A member of Franchouchou, the idol group comprised of zombies hailing from Saga. Often referred to as the Legendary Tae Yamada, she herself is unable to speak and has a penchant to immediately bite into things. Despite her zombie nature, she seems aware of her role as an idol and treasures the relationships she's formed in Franchouchou.

A young man suddenly transported to the Kingdom of Lugunica. Using his ability "Return by Death," he overcomes many dangers that threaten Emilia and the others. Despite being a timid coward, he always comes through when others need him most.
A budding alchemist who tackles the Kaleidoscope for science. Her unconventional experiments generally end in explosions.
A bright and bubbly witch-in-training. She's always got a smile, a ribbon, and her familiar Pippo.
Formerly a bodyguard to a traveling troupe. She was raised as a dancer, but on one fateful day, abandoned that path.
A hunter and raider of ruins. He works the desert marches, out of sight of the royal family. On one excursion, he unearthed his shock harpoon, which he uses to fell great beasts.

A miracle worker—or unlicensed quack, depending on who you ask. A man who marches to the beat of his own drum and whose only goal is to save as many people as he can with his medical and scriptural know-how.

A former lieutenant of the Gaean Navy. Try as she may to serve as a bridge between seafarers and floatdwellers, her stoic personality and inability to turn off from her duties make it rather difficult.
An adventurer who lives for the thrill of battle and death-defying escapades. His reckless nature and devil-may-care attitude has earned him the moniker, "The Deathrush Berserker".
A fire shaman who serves as the bridge between humanity and the fire sprites. She takes pride in her duties keeping the lights on at night for the citizens of Palpebra.
An inspector hired by the Guild to assess adventurers' performance. He's a strict stickler for the rules, but always has people's best interests at heart.
A winged warrior of the high mountains with a strong sense of duty to the traditions and prayers of her people. Perhaps she takes her responsibilities a bit too seriously at times.

A practitioner of the traditional healing arts of the Kingdom of Sand, she focuses on bringing the heart and mind into perfect equilibrium. With her by your side, you can trust you'll be in good hands.
A young, sword-swinging mousefolk boy from Fang Canyon. Inspired by tales of a legendary hero who saved his world, he leaves his home to broaden his horizons.
A young woman running a tailor shop in Palpebra. Her clothes are said to grant the wishes of those who wear them, making them especially popular among young women.
An assassin who once lived and worked in the shadows. He dons a tuxedo in order to repay his Valentine's Fest debt, and while it suits him, it also gives him an intimidating air.
A ranger who makes sure no funny business happens in the forest bordering Palpebra—when he isn't shirking his dull duties in favor of adventuring.
A budding adventurer who's always dreamed of clearing the Kaleidoscope. She dodges dangerous situations by quickly applying knowledge from how-to guides.
A mountain of a man, covered in scars, with a craggy face. But beneath that heavy armor, he is sweet and rather timid. He dislikes aggression and prefers using his shield to his hammer.
No one seems to know where she got her medical license, but her unique charm and allure have made her a popular medic with pirates across the sea.
A dire wolf assassin who served the dogfolk royalty—until the ceasefire made him obsolete. Not entirely sure what he wants to do with himself.
A fox who serves the yokai queen as Princess Inaho's governess. While she appears strict, she has a soft, motherly side.
2:
Shirano Akisame, servant of the Nine-tailed Fox, thought about days gone by.

Her princess had been in love with a human. Even after being utterly rejected, she kept smiling and enjoying her human manga...

Though her mother had been less than pleased to hear it. It seems that Shirano will have to continue mediating between the yokai queen and her daughter.

1: A lush who was relieved of her position as a monk. She travels Yamato with a keg of Lethean water, helping restless spirits wash away their regrets.
Despite being only twelve years old, this righteous sailor stays true to her sense of nautical justice and protecting the peace, no matter how hairy things get.
A stray dragon who's made a home for himself in Palpebra. Due to his cute appearance and ability to communicate with language, he's become a popular mascot character among the locals.
A dapper young lady learning the ropes of her family's business—supervising a magic spring. She's still learning, but takes care to look the part.
A beastfolk girl from the Floats. While she may not look it—much to her dismay—she's as tough and intrepid a mercenary as one could find.
A bubbly young shaman girl who left her hometown to experience the thrills of big-city life in Palpebra.
A young girl working as a scout in the Kaleidoscope. A mischievous type, she likes pulling pranks on people. Her skills as a scout, however, are second to none.
A sprite born from the Spirit Tree. Challua is enchanted when she encounters a festively decked out holiday tree, and decides to imitate it.
A dual blade-wielding adventurer who just can't seem to overlook people in need of help. Due to her charitable spirit, she hasn't been able to make much progress in the Kaleidoscope.
This bee forest sprite has learned to communicate using language. She likes her name, honey... and Light.

An old master of martial arts who has incorporated magic into his unique fighting style. In his golden years now, his carefree days are rich with laughter—nothing like how he lived during his prime, apparently.
A young panther man from Fang Canyon. While you wouldn't guess it from his flippant personality, he's an avid reader and would live in the library if he could.
2:
This panther never believed the legend from the start. To Claw, the legend of Whitetail was just a way to put an end to the bloodshed.

But as the white tiger before him asked for his next move, he couldn't help but think. Though his words might have been crude, they were sincere. They were the words of a true "bro."

1: A canid swordsman popular among younger dogfolk. Underneath his gentlemanly demeanor lie aggressive lupine instincts.
2:
Nimbus looked as though he recalled something when he saw Claw and Albert raise a toast—as though he met with someone he thought he'd never meet again...

After finishing the drink, Nimbus suggested that he and Albert have a drinking contest. The wolf grinned, his eyes unmoving.

It seemed that a hangover would delay their parting.

1: Lightning incarnate, blowing where the winds take her on tour and electrifying mortals with her bass-booming zaps.
A talented knife-wielder hailing from the Endless Blue with a taste for adventure—but an even bigger taste for the local pubs.
Son of a family of mages, which once enjoyed great prestige. Despite being young, he's got a mind for both magic and money. If only his spells didn't take so long to chant...

A student at Voluntas Academy. However, far outweighing her interest in magic is her fascination with firearms, a type of mechanical weapon discovered in the Kaleidoscope—so much, in fact, that she's started making her own.
A fortune teller from the Kingdom of Sand skilled in... MOST forms of divination.
A seasoned warrior who was born in a small village far from Palpebra. In his younger days, he was an adventurer, but after the loss of his village, he's grown accustomed to being on his own.
After touching a strange relic in an underwater ruin, this salvager interacts differently with gravity. Ever light of heart, now she is also light of gravity's pull.

A sheephird adventurer living in Palpebra with a sunny disposition and a love of rain. 

No matter the weather, she can always be seen wearing her rain gear.
A catfolk fighter, Mew's appearance is more human than feline. Though troubled by her lack of fur, she finally finds some comfort with her unusual form after arriving in Starview Village.
An practiced adventurer, well-known and well-liked in the Guild. He is a natural leader, caring but down-to-earth. His sound judgement has earned him the respect of his peers.
A friendly tree sprite who lives in the forest. Although she's not quite human, her gentle smile and spirit are all she needs to establish a connection with others.
2:
Spending the night together around a fire, Stella was touched by the words from this sprite.

"Challua knows. Stella nice. It'll be okay!"

These words took root in her heart—a memory to bring strength in the future, like the stalwart trunk of a mighty tree.
3:
意図され設計された『亜人』達とは異なる
新たなる知的生命体。
自由意志を描くエレメントの化身。
真なる精霊。

上位者達も知らぬ最果ての地で
混沌の中から産まれ出でたそれは
本来は人よりも神に近いものだったが
初めに悔恨と涙に触れ
次に歓喜の渦に包まれた事で、心を得た。

今、その心は星と共に
分かち合う事を願っている。

1: An undead soul who has lived for an eternity. Contrary to his ghastly appearance, he is a kind and gentle soul not without his own penitence.
2: A fearsome undead with a heart of gold, he cares deeply for Challua. Champion Light had never met a sage with such a positive disposition, and his opinion on the undead began to change after meeting Regitare.
3:
生命操作。感染する死をもって
かつて世界を滅ぼした、忌むべき邪法。

それが、このように使われる事があるとは！
歌い、炎を掲げ、戦う少年少女達。
願いが渦巻き、螺旋となって天へ昇っていく。

許されるとは思っていない。
許されたいとも思っていない。
ただ、尊きものを護るためならば
死ぬよりも、すべき事があるというだけの事！

不死王はカラカラと笑っていた。

1: A gallant gambler of the Endless Blue in search of the ultimate wager. Whether it's in the heat of battle or at the tables, she'll deal you a hand you won't forget!
A shy city kitty searching for her inner wildcat. Her "bald spots" are a sensitive subject, but her claws would make any catfolk jealous.

A fiend who calls herself a bon viveur. Actually, with the white paint and the clown costume, it's hard to tell whether she really is a fiend. But as Folus likes to say, "Mystery is the spice of life."
A devoted pharmacist searching for a legendary cure-all herb. She's gentle and relaxed, but gets in the no-nonsense zone when a patient's in trouble.
A Palpebran adventurer. Contrary to his modest self-assessments, he's a skilled spearman and solid mentor.
Young man running a family ranch in Palpebra. He's often in need of good help and hires adventurers from the Guild. Jester is a skilled maker of traps, which ward off predators.
Although her foul-mouthed persona may seem intimidating at first, this orphan actually has a heart of gold. Unfortunately, kindness can only take you so far in a life of crime.

A young prodigy active in Palpebra. Despite her impressive intellect, her lack of magical talent prevents her from using high-level spells. She keeps a steady supply of sugar on hand to ensure that her brain is always firing on all cylinders, satiating her boundless curiosity.
A rookie adventurer from Palpebra. As a big fan of the Grindle Tales book series, she aspires to be a fighter and supporter like the main heroine Patty.
A clumsy cleric who became an adventurer to support the orphanage that raised her. She makes up for her lack of experience with a strong work ethic.
A gorgeous gunwielder whose appreciation for beauty knows no bounds. But remember—true beauty takes all forms and more than what meets the eye. Just take a look at the beautiful world around you!
A knight who seeks the lost Oracle of the Wind. She is filled with righteousness and driven by loyalty, willing to lay down even her life to fulfill her duty.
A Palpebran delivery boy who runs errands for adventurers with the help of Baloosh, his giant bird buddy.
The sole proprietor and barkeeper at Raul's Bar, a popular bar located on a remote island. No matter the type of customer, he'll find a way to satisfy their order.
A Palpebran boy trying to be a knight just like his hero from a popular play. He's actively seeking someone to play the part of the knight's sister.
A greenhorn journalist writing for a magazine called the Oculus. What she lacks in experience, she makes up in determination.
A young girl raised by mountain wolves, she came to Palpebra after traversing the Kaleidoscope. She dreams of forming a new pack.

A young silkworm-like girl from the Garden of the Sprites. She has an abounding curiosity about all things human. The cocoons she produces can be woven into both powerful weapons and silky-smooth garments.
A selfless cleric who manages an orphanage in Palpebra. As always, she's hard at work making sure the kids have a Halloween to remember!
2: Getting dragged into the chaos of this Halloween was rough, but it was all worth it to see the smiles of her friends and the children. Besides, nothing would stop the angel of the orphanage from doing her job.

1: A new rookie of the security company, 3MM. After getting mixed up in an accident at work, she ends up in Starview Village.
A bionic boy living in Qualia City. While working as a delivery boy, he aims to become a professional extremeboarder. He can often be found practicing his skate tricks.
A Sheephird that drifted into another world while exploring the Kaleidoscope. He dreams of being surrounded by women, so he spends his days hitting on the ladies around him.
A quiet girl who wields a scythe. When her parents were seemingly lost to the Kaleidoscope, she began working there to recover their belongings.

A taciturn man who wields chakram with unparalleled grace. He was born on the desert marches, to a clan that eventually was wiped out by the royal family. Jalil escaped, disguised as a member of a traveling troupe.
A warrior who once served the Lord of Shadow. Though she's hard on both herself and others, she has a soft spot for her younger sister, Arum.
A shady information broker with dirt on all Palpebra's darkest secrets. Aspires to be the biggest name in his trade.
A man who hails from a now lost village in the Kingdom of Sand. A great famine took his friends and family. In its aftermath, he swore to dedicate his life and sword to preserving life.
A snarky girl who works as a maid-for-hire. She's more considerate than she lets on, and is an expert at tackling everyday tasks—including Kaleidoscope runs.
A mage with the ability to manipulate shadows who somehow ended up in Palpebra. Although she possesses magical talent, her lack of confidence often holds her back.
Due to this young boy's lifelong yet mysterious rapport with monsters, it's tough for him to make friends without freaking people out.
Reserved and new to the adventuring game, Meryll loves nothing more than reading a good book or writing a good story. After all, what could be better than indulging in one's fantasies?
A shy adventurer who is fully absorbed in her own fantasies. Although she has a knack for writing and illustrations, the real talk of the town is her new outfit.
A mummy that was sleeping in an old desert ruin. Though he remembers nothing of his past, he carries on with a smile, pranking all his friends and delighting in their surprise.

A youngster from Fang Canyon who aims to be the strongest in the world. Born as one of the physically weaker rabbitfolk, he trained hard enough that even the average dogfolk and catfolk will fall to his powerful kicks.
Once the young assistant to a certain detective, this aspiring sleuth now travels far and wide in search of his lost master.
A freaky head-shaped monster that appeared in the Kaleidoscope and immediately began transforming adventurers into gold. This thing's got tank treads, which are way better than legs.

An interdimensional visitor with a lot of energy and a tragic (?) backstory. Though it was once Towa Kiseki's dream to become an actual singer, her screwball antics (and the fact she commissioned a talking head of herself) are what shot her to fame. But no matter what curveballs are thrown at her, she'll hit it out of the park with gusto.
A mushroom sprite who resides in the Spirit Tree. With its bright red cap and stocky build, it's very much a mushroom indeed. Although it seems to have also sprouted legs somehow.
2:
This mushroom sprite shared mushrooms with its guests. The gesture seemed a little dubious at first, but the delicious taste of the mushrooms quickly erased any doubt.

Later, Alk began using red mushrooms more often in his cooking.

1:
Fierce like a dragon. Wild as a beast. This martial artist will go to any lengths to attain ultimate power.

Why the dog ears? Does she wear them out of a desire to make her inner self match her outward appearance? Or are they merely a tool to gain more power? Neither is the case.

She dons the ears precisely because it is the most logical thing to do.
2:
It was the perfect contract—balanced in every dimension.

A disinterested, unintrusive, mutually agreed-upon exchange of power for money. Two paths that travel out on parallel routes, never to cross. But for Shuilong, that made the arrangement all the more ideal.

Leagues better than her contract with that boy, at any rate.

1: This dogfolk warrior once dove headfirst into danger so that she might one day fade away in battle, but coming to Starview Village changed her. She now fights to protect the things she cares about.
2: Helga once fought as though violence was all she was good for, but her way of thinking has changed—she now has her paws full with many kind souls who care deeply for her. With a laugh, she resolved to fight on to protect them all.

1: One of the last surviving lionfolk, a species only talked about in catfolk legend. He once lived his life plagued by guilt over the sin of his ancestors, but has since learned to let go of the past. He works tirelessly now to give others the same freedom.
A young monk who came to Palpebra from a remote area and follows a faith local to her home. She loves to train, so much so that it's becoming her hobby.

A cosmic detective who is part of the CIPD (Cosmic Idol Police Department). She investigates matters related to the Battle Royale: All Star Smash, or BRASS for short. From the country of Tigerton, she works alongside the Cosmic Beast Gaiger.

Normally cheerful and dependable, she reverts to the mental state of a crying infant when subjected to extreme stress.
A saint in the Church of Falana who loves loafing around. Wearing an outfit donated by the merchant's guild, she celebrates the New Year... but is immediately exhausted by her saintly duties.

Once upon a time, she played the role of humanity's enemy and put on a show by fighting Champion Light. Now she puts on clothes from Yamato, further giving her the appearance of a temptress, ready to seduce others from the "proper" path.
A beautiful, charismatic and capable adventurer who has garnered immense popularity in Palpebra. In reality, her rapidly growing popularity terrifies her, and her fears persist into the new year.

A young panther who became the catfolk chief to help change his world for the better. Enjoying the New Year festivities lightheartedly without losing focus of his goals, Claw continues to fight alongside his friends by utilizing his unique talents.
A young elf mage hailing from a distant world who is a member of the unofficial guild Little Lyrical. Ever vigilant and possessed of a rational mind, she is a calm and composed star pupil.

A young girl from a faraway world who likes pranking people. As a member of the unofficial guild Little Lyrical, she seeks to one day become a great explorer. She also loves to play games of make-believe, exploring any place her imagination might take her.
A kindhearted beastfolk girl who came from a distant world. As leader of the unofficial guild Little Lyrical, she's good friends with Kyoka and Misogi, the other members.

Arbiter and heir to House Felder. She fell in love with Alk while working alongside him. Though she confessed with great fanfare, she was completely rejected. Still, a stubborn part of her refuses to give up on her feelings.
2:
She knows she's being foolish—foolish for falling in love, foolish for confessing, and foolish for liking him even after being rejected. Despite the trouble she's causing, she can't help herself. A part of her is determined to make him hers... no matter what it takes.

"Because I like you, idiot."

1: A hero whose exploits knew brilliant renown. Now, she walks a different path as a protector of the festival of love. The reality, she finds, isn't always bouquets, sunshine, and chocolates. And when it is, the aftertaste is often dark and bitter. That's just the kind of Valentine's Day it's shaping up to be.
2:
"I guess I'll just keep him around. Nothing like having a convenient backup boy in your pocket."

"No, that's not true! It's not!"
...Is what she wishes she could say.

But deep down, she knows who she really is—and that there are parts of her that she simply can't reveal to others.

Whoever she may be, one thing is certain: she will continue walking the path of a hero.

So, although it may be frustrating, she decides to put the whole question of "love" on hold. It's just not something she can answer now.

At the same time, she knows that one day, she'll no longer be able to keep running. One day, she'll have to suffer love's slings and arrows.

1: A mechanic from the Endless Blue who has devoted her entire life to repairing machines. She loves her work more than anything in the world—even eating and sleeping. The word "workaholic" was practically invented for this eager repairwoman.

A cheery, kind, and popular girl who works with her foster parents at a confectionery in Palpebra. Despite being a total coward when it comes to love, she overcame her fear of change and loneliness in order to confess her true feelings to the person she loves.
2:
We really did it...

...
...Ooh! Hah, ahh...
...Ahhhh...
I can't sleep. My face is hot and my toes are all tingly... My head won't stop spinning, either.

...Even if this love isn't pure... Even if it's little more than me being selfish... I know I love him. I don't care how scared I might be anymore.

Thanks to my friends, I was finally able to let out my feelings...
I'm so glad I fell in love with you, Will.

...
I hope we can do it again, tomorrow...

1: Released from the cycle that bound the ancient dragons, this magnificent being rejoiced in her newfound freedom in solitude. However, even she could not turn a blind eye to the cruel fate that bound the other dragons.

An android forged into an ultimate weapon by the Updaters, his frame is thoroughly equipped with the latest weapon systems. His real name is Alvin Architect, and he's a well-meaning youth who loves to hang out with his friends.

The drum major of the Voluntas Arcane Arts Academy marching band. A regular and unassuming girl, her kind spirit allows her to get along with anyone. At times, her head is full of worries about the future... but also with dreams of the future. Working hard to make her band proud, she acts as their guiding star, leading the way forward.

An ancient dragon that had become dependent on the girls who live with him but has now finally found steady work. Having shed his dependent status, Schult dresses like a human and spends time with the girls in a way like never before during White Fest.

A blade hidden in the annals of history, capable of bringing untold calamity to the East. Through a series of events, he now finds himself in the garb of a prince—for there is nothing he would not do to satisfy his partner.
The reliable squad commander of 3MM Security who somehow manages to always get herself out of tricky situations. Ever diligent and watchful, she is a true ally of justice.

A hero under Noxel Group who took on the title of Themis after the original passed. She is more hotheaded than she looks, especially when it comes to doling out justice. Despite her failures as a hero, she continues to soldier on with renewed hope in her heart.

A girl with a synthetic body and android soul. Stubborn to a fault, she views herself as superior to everyone else and abuses her powers in any way she sees fit. She was born from what was previously the most advanced AI in the city.

An operator that provides support to PBC's heroes, helping them increase their market value. Besides providing intel in the midst of battle, she ensures everyone has a place to return to at the end of the day.

The leader of a guild specializing in reclaiming lost articles of the dead. She possesses the power to hear the voices of the departed just by approaching them, and she listens sincerely to their lingering attachments and regrets. While somewhat detached from the living world, she's as beautiful and kindhearted as a person can be.

A member of a shady organization in the Endless Blue. Even within this seedy underbelly of society, he is feared as a mad monster who dances too gladly with death—all while deeply fearing it. Despite being untrusting of others and constantly engaged in conflict, he's somehow managed to stay alive.

This beastfolk girl works hard every day to be a famous fashion designer, just like her mother. While she has a tendency to get a little carried away with her ideas, she is supremely talented as a designer, and her passion for the craft is unmatched.

Quinvere is an airship captain and the CEO of Code Individual, an advertising company not affiliated with either Noxel Group or AltMeme. Roaming around doing as she pleases, she is driven entirely by her desire to "set new high scores in life."

A witch bound to a magic mirror who once aided the champion Light. Her youth preserved by the mirror's curse, she spends her days waiting for a champion—or even her Prince Charming—to free her from the mirror.

An adventurer and researcher at Voluntas Academy, Ernest spends much of his free time helping people around town. His kindness makes him very popular, but he insists with a smile that he does what he does out of a desire to be liked.

Known as Mayuzuki the Unseen, this elite ninja serves as a spy for the shogunate's secret intelligence. She is skilled enough to ensnare even the imperial court in her webs of intrigue, though for all her prowess, she does not seem to mind being treated as a tool.

An extremely skilled knight known to be Mirea's strongest blade. When Mirea's princess left to search for the country's sacred relics, Elmara followed after, interested in an adventure herself. She now roams freely, prioritizing having fun above all else.

As the self-proclaimed Marine Bunny Princess, Faroa hops into action whenever she hears a cry for help. While her arrival is typically accompanied by a somewhat gaudy self-introduction, she is loved by the people as a local hero.

As the first princess of the kingdom of Mirea, Toria hasn't stopped scheming to one day conquer Palpebra. Highly enthusiastic about fulfilling her goal, she had a uniform custom-made and has infiltrated Voluntas Academy. Even with her mission in mind, there's no way this princess is going to pass up her chance to attend events in Palpebra!
2:
We share the same dream...
With our shared love of Mirea, together we'll bring down the accursed Palpebra! It's so simple, so why does everyone struggle to understand this?

But I remember. I remember Nao's happy smile, and the sound of hope that everyone made when they cheered for that robot. And I remember the beautiful sound from that piano that Hibiki and I played together!

No matter the difficulty, I will never give up. Not with friends like this!
Long live the kingdom of Mirea!

1: Though she intended to go all out and enjoy her time at the festival, this Abyssal Diva got sniffed out for the pro she is and quickly got put to work doing what she does best—singing! Now sporting a new body frame (designed with feedback from Yuki Mishima), she sings her heart out to stir the souls of all those listening!
2:
It doesn't have to be my song. It doesn't have to be difficult, or complicated, or anything.

As long as I can learn it, sing it, and deliver every note safely to the hearts of my listeners, that's enough.

After the final note died out, the crowd erupted in applause. I was wrapped in a warm blanket of cheers and adulation. It was at that moment that I knew what I wanted to do—along with the help of Alk and Stella, of course.

I wanted to sing, and to make electrons and souls and hearts alike stop and stare when they hear my music. I wanted to become Shibuya's diva.

1: Logic-oriented mage and seeker of the abyss. Drawing a logical conclusion from his past experiences, his present companions and his personal objectives, Liam decides to don a uniform as a means of disguising himself.
2:
Wise and perceptive, Liam noticed something going on at the festival. While fully immersed in the frenetic atmosphere of students enjoying their youth, he realized that certain ties from his past had not been fully severed. Even still, the world carried on as usual.

"How troublesome..."

And so he picked up his staff. Soon, he developed new ties with the academy, and that seemed to suit him just fine.

1: Student council president at Voluntas Academy and daughter of the Sextans, one of the Nine Noble Houses of the Farlands. She is strongly interested in Shibuya's culture and strongly hopes to become good friends with its people.
2:
Let's take things one step at a time. I want to get to know each other, little by little, as we move forward toward together into the future... Just like the song you wrote.

I'll be right here for you, always. More than anyone else, anywhere, I believe in you. The world... the future. It has so much in store for you.

Binary Planet... No matter how far away you are, you're always by my side. No matter what happens, we're never alone.

1: This monster chef heads to the Endless Blue in hopes of learning more about oceanic monsters and their potential uses in cooking. She keeps her apron on even when she's dressed for the beach, so she can be ready to whip up a dish whenever and wherever.
2:
Seeing the girl off as she runs to convey her true feelings to her friends, Parfait adjusts her apron and returns to the kitchen, where her own battlefield awaits. After all, there's nothing better than gathering together at the dinner table for a delicious meal after a long day.

However, whether or not the meal is appealing in the first place is another matter entirely.

1:
"Call me back in time!"
Time never goes in reverse, but he meant what he said nonetheless. Even if the world is in peril, swimsuits must be appreciated... And with a will as strong as steel, he pushed his friend into action. At long last... summer begins! If things don't go according to plan... Well, that's a problem to deal with later.
2:
Shota Inori had his doubts.

Summer, beautiful girls, and a young man with exceptional powers...

Isn't this where flags usually come up?! Where you say dramatic stuff like, "I'll show you the skies," or something? Was I able to sense the mood properly this time?!

Remembering his sister's cold gaze upon seeing him with his dodgy, noisy company, Ayumu Nagihara was glad he decided to tag along.

1: A nurse that recently joined the Fellowship of Floof. Though she usually spends her days studying and improving her skills, right now she is busy enjoying her vacation, spending all her time basking in the summer sun with friends new and old.
2:
She wished she could tell them that everything would be okay. If she wiped away their tears, held their hands, and hugged them tight, then there was no problem they couldn't overcome together.

But the key, she realizes now, is for them to understand each other on a deeper level. There is merit in facing the pain that comes before happiness.

Her friendship with Echo and Primula is only just beginning.

1: This good-natured girl dives headfirst into her summer vacation. Will this overly helpful adventurer really be able to enjoy her vacation to the fullest? Her voice rings out through the air: "Welcome! Table for two?"
2:
This girl runs from east to west, helping anyone she can along the way and paving the way for her friends.

As a reward for her hard work, she receives the happy smiles of her friends, and also...

"Great work, Yuna. You've come a long way!"

The encouraging words of a friend mean the world to her. She wanted to jump with joy in the face of such praise, but she somehow managed to contain her excitement.

1: Flipping everyone the bird, she punched through the dome of her world, just to see the sky with her partner. Now, the Bullet of Freedom explores a new world, eager to experience new skies.
2:
Despite monumental obstacles and binding chains, she remained steadfast in her defiance. Everyone desires freedom, but the Bullet of Freedom is drawn to those who embrace this desire with all their being.

Like the young girl who broke free from her father's control and now enjoys the summer sun of another world. For her, Bulleta is ready to pull the trigger and blow away any and every obstacle.

1: Blue skies, white clouds, and a strobe light fundoshi. Couple these with a brand-new body frame, and you have a ninja samurai who is ready to take on the shore. Clutching tight to his ideal of bringing peace and justice to the seas, he embarks on a summer vacation alongside his closest friends.
2:
"What does it mean to be a true hero? Why, it means one must cut down any and all villains that stand before you... It means forging a path forward for others to walk—like those fine young ladies, for instance. If my deeds could be spoken of in the same breath as those of Lady Bulleta, I would consider this summer vacation a roaring success!"

Pleased as punch, the ninja samurai started leafing through the memories saved in his "favorites" folder. Mere minutes later, however, he would have an(other) existential crisis, questioning if he really even deserves to call himself a "hero."

But one thing remained undeniably true despite his maelstrom of self-doubt: those girls he protected now had huge, beaming smiles on their faces.

1: A girl who was once unaware of what the world had to offer, but now chooses her place in it, experiencing life's thrills for the first time. Beneath the hot summer sun, this flower blooms under newfound passion and the attention it offers.
2:
She wished to share everything together. The salty breeze. The bright summer sun. Their tears. She arrogantly thought that she could be the hero, despite understanding little of the world and herself.

Even so, she still wishes to share everything with Echo and Pythica—their good and their bad sides. She swears to become a friend capable of being by their side, for there is no greater happiness than that in her mind.

1: A girl who lived in Miner's Front. She found out that the world was bigger and kinder than she'd ever anticipated—though this was a lesson learned through bitter tears. Friends by her side, she walks on forward, trying to make happy new memories.
2:
I... want to make memories. Memories of the past, but also of things that haven't happened yet!

Though I know some people would disagree and say that memories are nothing but a crutch...

I just don't want to forget all those fun moments, and even the sad or painful ones too! I want to remember being by my friends' side.

One day, when I'm looking through my albums, I want to be able to say "Oh yeah! I remember that." And in that moment, I'll smile, and recall all the wonderful moments we spent together.

1: A young boy who just broke free of his father's grasp and decided to walk his own path. Sometimes catty in both personality and appearance, he tries to act more mature than he might actually be. Once he awakens to a mysterious power, he is reunited with someone whom he greatly admired.

A popular idol hero who sings, dances, and fights to protect the peace of Qualia City and the dreams of its people. Despite her cutesy demeanor, her heart burns with a fiery will and her body is equipped with the latest in military-grade firepower. She belongs to INOBEC, a prosthetics manufacturer.
A solitary thief living in the desert borderlands. She is rumored to be a famous thief-hunter nicknamed "Cobra," but she herself refuses to be called by that name.

As one of the lionfolk survivors, Magnos was deeply affected by his ancestors' sins, and he once resolved to recreate the world into one that would accept him. Having barely escaped death following this event, this young man searches for his true purpose while lamenting his sins.

A sixteen-year-old, second-year high school student. She loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves, loves Shota Inori.
A young artist from the East who left her merchant family behind to become Gramp Zigza's disciple. Once inspiration hits, little can deter her from picking up a brush and diving straight to work.

Bearing the holy sword known as Hartstrahl, this adventurer girl is committed to help the weak and do what's right. She possesses a dignified air and is highly capable despite being a novice, but there is a secret to her strength and character.
A vampire girl who has taken up residence in a castle. She seeks out individuals who will agree to become her followers, approaching people and posing the question in a somewhat unique fashion.

The trumpet section leader of the Voluntas Arcane Arts Academy Marching Band. Strong-willed but attentive, this curly-haired girl is quite the princess. She gave up the position of Drum Major to her long-time rival, but has never once taken her eyes off of the top.

ウォルンタス魔法学院ゴーレム部の部長。
学生でありながら、既に一流を超えた
技術と理論を持つゴーレムの天才。
しかし、その技術に周囲は付いていけておらず
結果としてゴーレム暴走の原因となる事も。

霊鏡の化身。かつての主達を封じられ
共にヤマタノオロチと化していたが、
主の怨念を切られた事で解放された。
とある抜け忍が探し求めている存在。

大海にその名をはせた大海賊であり、
陸政府も手を焼く海賊団『暴鯨』の元船長。
その在り方は暴虐と呼ぶのに相応しく、
敵も味方も諸共に滅ぼすような闘いで
誰からも恐れられた存在。

剣に愛された。故に剣のみを愛すると定めた。
忘我の果てだけが己の置き場所と考えた少女は
しかし今、恋をしていた。

自警団ギルドナイツの第一部隊・副隊長。
白き粛清に抗い、新たな街が混ざり、
いつもと少し違うハロウィンがやってきた。
信念と憧憬の進路を己に問い続けながら、
漆黒のウエディングドレスは歩みを止めない。

冒険者ギルドの手伝いをしている少女。
正規の職員ではないので、今回の衣装は
あくまでハロウィン用のコスプレにすぎない。
――彼女がネコミミや尻尾のない正規の制服に
袖を通すのは、もう少し先のお話である。

色違いの翼を持って生まれた鳥族の姫巫女。
本来、色違いの翼は飛ぶのに不向きだが
巫女に与えられた槍の力で自由に空を飛べる。
神の使いとして大切に育てられ当人も
その幸運さを理解してはいるが……。

『ベスタ族』の若き癒やし手。
人間と分かりあいたいと願っており
『心角』による交流を積極的に行っている。
その振る舞いから
長であるメムラムに説教される事もしばしば。

海の世界を旅する少女拳士。
門派の裏切者を誅する使命を遂行せんとする
真面目な性格。だが、真に彼女を駆り立てる
のは、戦いへの本能的な喜びである。

落ちた飛燕。光に導かれた者。
地に足つけた英雄ならざる騎士。
再度の祖国の危機を前に、彼は再び飛び立つ。
転んでも、落ちても、敗北しても。
一度も手放さなかった理想と共に、
新たなる仲間達の力を得て。
2:
ただ一人、歩いていけばいいと思っていた。
他者を巻き込まず、小さな一歩を積み重ね。
理想には、そうやってたどり着けばいいと。

なのに、その騎士道を
継承してしまった者がいた。

それが恐ろしくも嬉しく、危なっかしくて。
『だから、放っておけなかった。
それだけの話ですよ』

1:
本名、ヴェルーガ・ソロン。
王族の身辺警護を誉とするソロン家の出で
あるにも関わらず、３０年前の王族暗殺事件を
機に姿を消した『裏切りのソロン』。
忘れてしまった筈の愛を取り戻して、
男は再び剣を取った。
2:
火は再び灯った。
しかし、身を焦がす復讐の火ではない。
それはもう、自分にはできない事だ。

では、なんのために？

射貫くような少女の眼に、思い出す笑顔。
それに、なにもできなかった自分――
だが今なら、助けられるよな？
男は再び、闇の中を走り始めた。

1:
本名、シェルード・サーディア。
ファーランド王国、三の家・サーディアの
領主であり、シルティーの兄。
妹に敗れた兄は、王国の剣となる道を
歩み始める。しかしその眼はまだ、
光り輝く頂きを見つめていた。
2:
剣鬼に敗れ、サーディアの剣となった。
己の道を選んだ。そのつもりだった。

幼き王子が、飛燕の騎士が剣を握る。
ならば私も剣を掲げよう。
光の頂へ突き進んでやろう。

気づけば口角が上がっていた。
そうして、己の熱が
未だ消えていない事を知るのだ。

1:
パルペブラに栄えるウォルンタス魔法学院の
学院長にして『創設者』。
少なくとも天蓋都市パルペブラよりも
多くの歳を重ねている筈の、謎多き人物。
近代魔法理論を再構築した、歴史に残る
偉人としても知られている。

ファーランド王国王位継承権第五位の王子。
話し合いを是とする理想家であり、
かつて飛燕の騎士に憧れた少年。
危うくも、少年は己の光へと進んでいく。
積み重ねるのは、よりよい未来への一歩。
2:
父の言葉は幼稚で、稚拙で、実現性は
限りなく低い理想論でしかない。
そのくらいの事は分かっていた。
だが、それでも。王たらんとするのなら。

――願いを拾い上げ、光を掲げる。

それが、全ての始まりであり。
この、遥かなる王道が行きつく
いつかの幸せな未来であれ。

1:
説明しよう！トレジャーサンタとは！
トレジャーをハントし、欲しい人にプレゼント
し、時にハントの楽しさも布教する……
そんなサンタクロースなのである！
――つまり、大体いつものミアである。

２体の鬼を従え、旅をする花魁。
自身が在籍していた『白雲楼』を探している。
情報を求めて多くの宴席に顔を出しており、
パルペブラでは彼女に熱を上げている者達も
多いという。

聖夜に現れた癒しと祝福のサンタナース。
その正体は真面目な薬草士。患者さんに
少しでも聖夜祭の雰囲気を味わってもらおうと
彼女は人々に元気と健康を届けて回る。

『卯国』の代表アイドルにして
サーカスから差し向けられた恐るべき刺客。
ぬいぐるみを駆使する事によって
単独でのグループ活動を実現しており
そのアイドル強度は計り知れない。

パルペブラのギルドナイツと協力し
人々を護る事に尽力する、美しき渋谷の少女。
かつて誰にも踏み荒らされぬように
小さな世界を作っていた少女は、
いつかの自分がそうだったように
『憧れ』を向けられるようになっていた。

トライミニッツ特別技術対応課の課長。
豪腕、元気、チームと仲間が大好き。
だからこそ彼女が新年一発目にぶち込んだのは
『特別技術対応課シブヤ支部』の設立だった。
